Content: *p73459ra0236*do not write in this area 		do not write in this area				 		do not write in this area2  section aanswer all questions.for questions 1–10, in section a, select one answer from a to d and put a cross in the box . if you change your mind, put a line through the box  and then mark your new answer with a cross .1 	 which of the following is the number of neutrons in a nucleus of 12151sb?	a	 51	b	 70	c	 121	d	 172(total for question 1 = 1 mark)2 	 what is the process by which electrons are released from a heated filament?	a	 excitation	b	 ionisation	c	 photoelectric emission	d	 thermionic emission(total for question 2 = 1 mark)
